Splunk | www.splunk.com | Worldwide | Onsite | Full-time | Engineering & Non-engineering roles

Splunk was founded to pursue a disruptive new vision: make machine data accessible, usable and valuable to everyone. Machine data is a fast growing and pervasive part of “big data”—generated by every component of IT infrastructures, applications, mobile phone location data, website clickstreams, social data, sensors, RFID and much more.

Splunk is focused specifically on the challenges and opportunity of effectively managing massive amounts of machine data, and providing a next-generation platform for powerful new applications.

http://www.splunk.com/view/SP-CAAAGMJ

We're also looking to fill quite a few non-engineering roles at the moment: http://www.splunk.com/view/SP-CAAAGMD

I'm a developer at Splunk and it's awesome. Feel free to contact me with any questions or if you're thinking of applying.
